2 Functional Developer's COM, OLE, and ActiveX Libraries

2.1 Introduction

This chapter introduces Functional Developer's support for Microsoft's Component Object Model, COM, and the various technologies based on it--Object Linking and Embedding (OLE) for compound documents, OLE Automation, OLE/ActiveX controls, and so on.
